page.title: 13EVENTS OF THE FINZEAN YEAR.
page.content: In the course of a year,Finzean{people may enjoy the Farmers'Ball when a silver tankard is presented to the local golf champion,the School Carol Service,PTA or WRI whists and beetle drives,the WRI outing,the Finzean Folk Festival,Finzean School Coffee Evening and Parents' Night,replaced every fourth year by a musical and dramatic event in the Hall,Sales and Teas organised by the Guild or other Club, a Fete in the grounds of Finzean House if money is urgently required for the Church and the Royal Deeside Horse Trials in the policies of Finzean House. {Senior citizens}enjoy the Community Association's Christmas Party,when School pupils entertain,young Church {members}a Sports and Barbecue and the {children}sports,picnics and disco.
